text: Hans-Jürgen Bäsler (28 March 1938 – May 2002) was a German footballer. Bäsler made 17 appearances in the Bundesliga during his playing career. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1938 births Category:2002 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Bundesliga players Category:Arminia Bielefeld players
title: Hans-Jürgen Bäsler
